title: Gabe
description: I am a good guy. I help little old ladies cross the street. I recycle. Anyone looking at me will see a solid, respectable, upstanding member of the community.Which is exactly what I want them to see.Gabe Marshall is tall, charming and a successful businessman. He’s also a skilled con artist. Now that he's heir to the billionaire father he never knew, everyone gives him what he wants. Except Sasha Whitman. After Sasha is humiliated on national television, she seeks solace in her plans to open a jazz lounge. But she’s not a businesswoman and no one has time to help her except the last man she would ever trust. Before long Gabe is matching wits with the one woman who can see through his game. And finding out that all the money in the world can't protect you when the sins of the father pass to the son. GABE is the third book in M. Malone's gritty romance series BLUE-COLLAR BILLIONAIRES. It can be read as a standalone novel. However, once you find out what the billionaire pops from hell is up to, you will definitely want to read about TANK and FINN, too!
author: M. Malone
